name: Prof. Dr. Md. Kabirul Islam
degree: MBBS, MS (Ped. Surgery), FICS (USA), FRCS(Glasg). Trained in Pediatric Urology (UK) & Pediatric Laparoscopic Surgery (India)
short_description: Prof. Dr. Md. Kabirul Islam is the first qualified Pediatric Surgeon in Bangladesh with over 30 years of experience.
description: Prof. Dr. Md. Kabirul Islam is a senior Pediatric surgeon with extensive experience in the field. He graduated from Chittagong Medical College and has worked at Dhaka Shishu Hospital and other prestigious institutions.
achievements: Editor-in-Chief of 'The Journal of Surgical Science'

patient_reviews.comment: Dr. Kabirul Islam is amazing! He handled my son's surgery with utmost care and professionalism.
Great doctor! The consultation was thorough.

name: Dr. Amina Rahman
short_description: Dr. Amina Rahman specializes in cardiovascular health and has a wealth of experience in managing complex cases.
description: Dr. Amina Rahman graduated from Dhaka Medical College and has been practicing cardiology for over 15 years. She is known for her patient-centered approach.
achievements: Member of Cardiology Association of Bangladesh

patient_reviews.comment: Dr. Amina is a fantastic cardiologist. She saved my life!
Very thorough and knowledgeable. Highly recommend!

name: Dr. Tahmina Sultana
short_description: Dr. Tahmina Sultana is a leading dermatologist with extensive experience in skin treatments and cosmetic procedures.
description: Dr. Tahmina Sultana graduated from Dhaka Medical College and has specialized in dermatology for over 10 years. She is well-known for her expertise in skin disorders.
achievements: Member of Dermatology Society of Bangladesh

patient_reviews.comment: Dr. Tahmina transformed my skin! So grateful!
Knowledgeable and professional. I felt at ease.

name: Dr. Shahidul Islam
short_description: Dr. Shahidul Islam is a highly experienced orthopedic surgeon specializing in joint replacement surgeries.
description: Dr. Shahidul Islam has been practicing orthopedics for over 20 years, focusing on joint replacements and sports medicine.

patient_reviews.comment: Fantastic surgeon! My knee feels brand new!
Very skilled and professional. Highly recommend!

name: Dr. Farhana Nisa
short_description: Dr. Farhana Nisa is a compassionate gynecologist with expertise in maternal care and women's health.
description: Dr. Farhana Nisa graduated from Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University and has been practicing for over 12 years.
achievements: Member of Obstetrics and Gynecology Society

patient_reviews.comment: Dr. Farhana is so kind and understanding. I felt cared for.
Very knowledgeable and patient. Great experience!

name: Dr. Anwar Hossain
short_description: Dr. Anwar Hossain is an experienced neurologist known for his expertise in stroke management.
description: Dr. Anwar Hossain completed his MD in Neurology from Dhaka Medical College and has been practicing for over 18 years.
achievements: Member of Neurological Society of Bangladesh

patient_reviews.comment: Dr. Anwar diagnosed my issue quickly. Very grateful!
Very thorough examination. I feel much better now.

name: Dr. Kazi Nazrul Islam
short_description: Dr. Kazi Nazrul Islam is a renowned gastroenterologist known for his expertise in liver diseases.
description: Dr. Kazi Nazrul Islam completed his training in Gastroenterology from BSMMU and has been practicing for over 16 years.

patient_reviews.comment: Dr. Kazi helped me understand my condition. Highly recommend!
Good experience overall. I trust his judgment.

name: Dr. Jahanara Begum
short_description: Dr. Jahanara Begum specializes in pediatric health and is passionate about children's well-being.
description: Dr. Jahanara Begum graduated from Dhaka Medical College and has been working with children for over 14 years.

patient_reviews.comment: Dr. Jahanara is amazing with kids! My daughter loves her.
Very caring and professional. Would recommend to others.

name: Dr. Mizanur Rahman
short_description: Dr. Mizanur Rahman specializes in diabetes management and thyroid disorders.
description: Dr. Mizanur Rahman completed his training in Endocrinology from BSMMU and has been practicing for over 10 years.

patient_reviews.comment: Dr. Mizanur has helped me manage my diabetes effectively.
Very attentive and knowledgeable. Good experience!
